name: lemniscate - an endless fall
description:
Lemniscate is designed to be a minimal, but addictive game with simple mechanics. It is made by Asad Dhorajiwala - an indie game dev.

How to Play:
● Tap on the left side of the screen to make the ball jump left, and on the right side of the screen to the ball jump right.  Longer taps produce slightly larger jumps*
● Avoid obstacles as you fall down.
● Collect Stars.

Please send all feedback to otareo.games@gmail.com. I'd love to hear from you! Also, make sure you can share, review the game. 

Note:
regular updates with more features on the way! 

Credits:
Game UI base icons by Freepik from www.flaticon.com
